summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Universal Product Search Platform with DYNAMIC SOURCES feature. AI-powered marketplace discovery working perfectly (100% success rate) - different products return different, relevant marketplace sources. Backend APIs working flawlessly with GPT-5.2 integration. Frontend fully functional with all 5 tabs, dynamic sources display, vendor details, and price summaries.
passed_tests: Health check endpoint returns healthy status with gpt-5.2 model
Root API endpoint working correctly
Valid product search with proper results structure
Empty query validation (returns 400)
Location-based searches with correct currencies (USA $, UK £, India ₹, Dubai AED)
Recent searches endpoint functionality
Vendor details included in all search results with complete contact information
Vendor contact details properly formatted (100% valid email, phone, address)
Vendor types and verification statuses working (Global Suppliers, Local Markets, Online Marketplaces)
DYNAMIC MARKETPLACE DISCOVERY - Gaming laptop in USA returns gaming/electronics sources (Amazon, B&H Photo, Newegg, Micro Center)
DYNAMIC MARKETPLACE DISCOVERY - Nike shoes in India returns sports/footwear sources (Myntra, AJIO, Nike India, Flipkart)
DYNAMIC MARKETPLACE DISCOVERY - Steel bars construction returns construction/B2B sources (IndiaMART, TradeIndia, SteelOrbis, Alibaba)
Different products return different marketplace sources (3/3 pairs with distinct sources)
Homepage loads with hero section and search functionality
Search functionality working with AI processing and dynamic source discovery
Product cards display vendor name and 'View Vendor Details' button
Vendor Details modal opens and displays all required information
All 5 tabs working perfectly: Products (50 cards), Vendors (50 vendors), Charts (price comparison + source distribution), Insights (markdown analysis), Sources (dynamic marketplaces)
Sources tab displays dynamically discovered marketplaces specific to product categories
Price summary cards display correctly (Lowest, Highest, Average prices)
Export PDF button functional and enabled
Sticky header with compact search appears after results
Gaming laptop sources include electronics-specific marketplaces
Nike shoes sources include sports/footwear-specific marketplaces
Construction materials sources include B2B/industrial marketplaces
